Overview: After a catastrophic event leaves their bodies destroyed, Ne Zha and Ao Bing are granted a fragile second chance at life. As tensions rise between the dragon clans and celestial forces, the two must undergo a series of perilous trials that will test their bond, challenge their identities, and decide the fate of both mortals and immortals.
英文译名: Nezha: Child of Chaos, Tempest of the Sea
翻译理由: “Child of Chaos”取代了直译的“Demon Child”，更宏大且符合电影中哪吒反叛的命运主题；“Tempest of the Sea”则以更具诗意的表达，将“闹海”这一特定神话行为转化为席卷海洋的史诗级冲突。

Overview: A young boy is born as the reincarnation of a demonic power, into a society that hates and fears him. Destined by prophecy to bring destruction to the world, Nezha must choose between good and evil to see if he can change his fate.
英文译名: Nezha: Advent of the Demon Child
翻译理由: 此译名保留了核心神话人物“Nezha”之名。“Advent”替代了“降世”，强调其预言般的、具有世界性影响的到来。同时，“Demon Child”直接点明了原片名中“魔童”的关键身份，突显了他被社会厌恶与恐惧的悲剧性命运。

English Title: Creation of the Gods II: Demon Force
Overview: Taishi Wen Zhong led the army of Shang Dynasty including Deng Chanyu and four generals of the Mo Family to Xiqi. With the help of Kunlun immortals such as Jiang Ziya, Ji Fa led the army and civilians of Xiqi to defend their homeland.
英文译名: Investiture Saga: Chapter Two – Conflagration at Xiqi
翻译理由: “Investiture Saga”确立了史诗般的系列基调，并指代了“封神”的神话主线；“Conflagration at Xiqi”（西岐的战火）则将“战火西岐”的激烈冲突和地理核心地带进行了戏剧化处理，保留了原片名的关键意象。

English Title: Legends of the Condor Heroes: The Gallants
Overview: Under Genghis Khan, the Mongolian army pushes west to destroy the Jin Dynasty, setting its sights on the Song Dynasty next. Amid internal conflicts among martial arts schools, Guo Jing unites the Central Plains' warriors to defend Xiangyang, embodying courage and loyalty in the fight for the nation.
翻译理由: “The Condor Heroes”保留了原IP的知名意象，而“Sentinel of the Middle Kingdom”则将副标题“侠之大者”从个人武艺提升到保家卫国的宏大主题，强调了郭靖作为国家核心区域（中原）守护者的角色。该译名自然流畅地传达了武侠精神中“为国为民”的最高道德内涵，符合影片以襄阳保卫战为背景的史诗基调。

Overview: In the Nanjing Massacre of 1937, in order to save his life, postman A Chang pretended to be a photo developer in a photo studio and developed photos for the Japanese army. He also took in a group of Chinese soldiers and civilians, turning the studio into a temporary shelter. However, in the face of the Japanese army's cruel atrocities, A Chang risked his life to safely transfer the refugees and exposed the evidence of the massacre to the public.
英文译名: The Nanking Darkroom
翻译理由: 选择“Darkroom”而非更普遍的“Photo Studio”，更具专业性和象征意义，突显了主角在历史的黑暗时期隐秘冲洗照片、揭示真相的行动。使用“Nanking”这一更具历史沉重感的旧拼法，旨在立刻唤起英文语境中对1937年南京大屠杀事件的记忆。

English Title: Detective Dee: The Four Heavenly Kings
Overview: Dee, the detective serving Chinese empress Wu Zetian, is called upon to investigate a series of strange events in Loyang, including the appearance of mysterious warriors wearing Chiyou ghost masks, foxes that speak human language and the pillar sculptures in the palace coming alive.
英文译名: Detective Dee: The Four Divine Sovereigns
翻译理由: 此译名保留了核心数字“四”，并将“天王”转化为“Divine Sovereigns”（神圣君王），以强调这些角色在古代中国语境中至高无上的神话地位与对皇权的威胁。这使译名在英文语境中更加流畅有力，既符合狄仁杰系列电影的史诗风格，又避免了宗教色彩过于浓厚的直译。

Overview: During China's Tang dynasty the emperor has taken the princess of a neighboring province as his wife. She has borne him two sons and raised his eldest. Now his control over his dominion is complete, including the royal family itself.
英文译名: The Imperial City Clad in Gold Armament
翻译理由: 此译名捕捉了原片名中“滿城盡帶黃金甲”的宏大且具有毁灭性的视觉意象，将“黃金甲”转化为“Gold Armament”，强调了皇权之下的武装冲突。它确立了电影的史诗背景（Imperial City），同时暗示了华丽表象下隐藏的致命斗争。

Overview: When a rival nation sends troops to invade the Song Dynasty, the emperor sends general Yang Ye (Adam Cheng) to defend the nation. However, Yang's place in the court is shaky due to a feud with Pan Renmei caused by the accidental death of his son at the hands of one of Yang's sons. At the battle, Yang is abandoned by Pan's troops, leaving him trapped in the face of an attack by Yeli Yuan (Shao Bing), an enemy general who wants to kill Yang to avenge his father. After learning about their father's predicament, Yang Ye's seven sons set out to rescue their father at any cost.
翻译理由: “Generals of Allegiance”旨在传达“忠”的精髓及其身份（將），强调杨家对国家坚定的效忠。“The Yang Family Saga”则突显了“烈”的史诗性与悲剧色彩，以及“楊家將”作为中国传统文化中知名英雄群体的分量。

Overview: Apprentices at the Oolong Courtyard school are suspicious when two outsiders try to join the prestigious academy despite their strange behaviour.
英文译名: New Oolong Courtyard: Mayhem Masters
翻译理由: 此译名保留了“新”和“乌龙院”的核心IP，同时将“笑闹江湖”凝练为更具喜剧动感的“Mayhem Masters”。这既强调了片中高能、捣蛋的学徒精神，也暗示了他们在武林（江湖）中制造混乱（Mayhem）的喜剧主题。

English Title: Creation of the Gods I: Kingdom of Storms
Overview: Based on the most well-known classical fantasy novel of China, Fengshenyanyi, the trilogy is a magnificent eastern high fantasy epic that recreates the prolonged mythical wars between humans, immortals and monsters, which happened more than three thousand years ago.
英文译名: The Investiture Epic: Part I – The Tempest at Chaoge
翻译理由: “The Investiture Epic”直接点明了电影核心主题“封神”（众神册封），并用“Epic”强调了其史诗三部曲的宏大背景。 “The Tempest at Chaoge”将“风云”转化为更具戏剧性和冲击力的“Tempest”（暴风/大动乱），准确表达了在商朝都城朝歌爆发的剧烈政治与军事动荡。

Overview: The Founding of an Army is a 2017 Chinese film commissioned by China's government to commemorate the 90th anniversary of the founding of the People's Liberation Army.
英文译名: The Monumental Genesis of the Force
翻译理由: “Monumental”旨在传达原片名中“大业”所蕴含的宏大历史意义与不朽功绩。“Genesis of the Force”则用于取代直译的“建军”，强调这是中国人民解放军诞生（起源）这一具有开创性的历史时刻。

Overview: Yang Zirong disguises himself as a bandit to infiltrate and destroy a bandit group. He joins hands with a hostage, and together, they fight against the warlord, Hawk.
英文译名: The Strategic Seizure of Tiger Mountain
翻译理由: 此译名侧重于原片名中的“智”与“取”，使用“Strategic Seizure”强调了主角通过计谋而非强攻夺取要地的核心情节。将“威虎山”处理为“Tiger Mountain”，保留了地点名称，突显了这座山作为土匪军事堡垒的威慑性与重要性。

Overview: The Monkey King and his friends try to break free from a ruler that takes them hostage. However, their exploits provoke the anger of a deity that decides to punish them for their actions.
英文译名: The Monkey King: Realm of the Matriarchs
翻译理由: 该译名采用“The Monkey King”来迅速定位源自《西游记》的系列电影，更符合西方商业片的命名习惯。 “Realm of the Matriarchs”将字面的“女儿国”升华为一个由女性统治者掌权的神话国度，强调了其政治独立性与对取经团的潜在威胁。

Overview: The nine-tailed queen of the fox tribe is graceful and beautiful, but unfortunately, she fell into the hands of Yuan Hong, the boss of the seven monkey monsters of Meishan. She was rescued by Jiang Ziya, but Jiang Ziya also cut off one of her tails. The desperate Nine Tails, under the guidance of Empress Nuwa, posessed Daji and became the daughter of Ho Suhu in Jizhou. Before long, King Zhou led an army to attack Jizhou, to thank her father, Da Jihu went into battle by herself, but was captured by King Zhou. The two talked about the way of war by the river. Daji's insights deeply convinced King Zhou and he fell in love with her. That night King Zhou asked Suhu for the permission to marry Daji, and Daji became the empress of the Shang Dynasty, yet, that's when the chaos in the world world began.
英文译名: **The Celestial Uprising: Daji
翻译理由: “The Celestial Uprising” 用以替代“封神”，强调了这场涉及神灵、导致王朝覆灭的宏大战争与混乱起源，更符合西方史诗电影的命名习惯。“Daji”作为副标题，直接点明了这位狐妖皇后是引发这场神人混战的最终核心人物。

Overview: A chronicle of the events that led to the founding of the Chinese Communist Party.
英文译名: The Genesis of the Grand Revival
翻译理由: 我选用“Genesis”来强调建党这一具有开创性的历史起点，避免使用普通的“Founding”。“The Grand Revival”则旨在捕捉“伟业”所蕴含的宏大历史使命感和官方叙事中对国家复兴的期望，使译名更具史诗般的重量。

Chinese Title: 武状元苏乞儿之天降神谕
Overview: The last days of the Qing Dynasty. The capital officials are confident that the reign can collapse at any moment. After a series of mysterious deaths of court ministers, the Emperor decides to conduct a sacred ritual of cleansing the heavens. At the same time, he instructs the only miraculously surviving minister Fucha Yuheng to find the killer and punish him. Fucha turns for help to his friend - Crazy So. King of Beggars .
英文译名: So Chan, The Beggar King: Revelation of the Celestial Mandate
翻译理由: 我将“武状元苏乞儿”的核心身份提炼为“The Beggar King”（乞儿之王），这是他在武侠世界中最广为人知的称号，并用“So Chan”指代人物。副标题“Revelation of the Celestial Mandate”则有力地概括了“天降神谕”在晚清背景下，所蕴含的政治崩塌与天命转移的文化意涵。

Overview: Martial arts action film Wu Seng was made in commemoration of the 25th anniversary of Jet Li classic The Shaolin Temple. Set in the 14th century during the early years of the Ming Dynasty, Wu Seng stars Hong Kong action star Terry Fan Siu Wong as Shaolin-trained general Yang Wu. After Yongle usurped the throne from Emperor Jianwen, loyal general Yang Wu secretly rescued child prince Zhu Wenkui and placed him in the care of the Wenchang Temple. Ten years later, Wenkui has grown up to be a strong, young man and Yang Wu is ready to put his plans to overthrow Yongle into action. When the Emperor discovers the plot, however, he sends an army of assassins after Yang Wu and Wenkui. They flee to Dafo Temple where Yang and the temple's monks make their final stand against the emperor's men.
英文译名: The Warrior Ascetic
翻译理由: “Warrior”直接对应“武”，突显影片的动作元素；“Ascetic”则比单纯的“Monk”更能体现“僧”的苦行和修行特质，从而保留了原片名中蕴含的东方精神与文化深度。此译名突出了主角身份的对立统一性，更具史诗感和吸引力。

English Title: Detective Dee and the Mystery of the Phantom Flame
Overview: When the future empress Wu Zetian's two courtiers die in a mysterious fire, she gets Di Renjie, a former detective and rebel, released from prison to solve the mystery of the fire.
英文译名: Detective Dee and the Empire of Ascension
翻译理由: “Ascension”一词精准地捕捉了“通天”所蕴含的文化野心，既暗示了剧情的宏大（直达天听的阴谋或建筑），也呼应了武则天企图登基、达到权力顶峰的态势。“Detective Dee”则保留了主角的身份并增加了英文片名的流畅度。

Overview: In Ruoxi Ho's time, evil forces are rampant on the island of Palm Wild, where tens of thousands of Tian clansmen live. When Lin Yu (Liu Yanchen), a ranger, learns of this, he decides to return to the island to quell the turmoil and save the Tian clan, to whom he owes a debt of gratitude. On the way, Lin Yu meets a mysterious woman named Yu Lu (Shen Yu), whose identity is unknown.
英文译名: Chronicles of the Eastern Seaboard
翻译理由: “Chronicles”取代了“录”和“异闻”，暗示这是一部记录了神秘而奇特事件的历史卷宗；“Eastern Seaboard”则保留了“东海”的地理方位和文化根基，使其成为一部富有史诗感的东方奇幻片名。

English Title: The Westward: The Kingdom of Shadow
Overview: "The Westward: Shadow City" tells the story that in order to control Tang Sanzang to seize the eternal fire, Moying, the lord of the Shadow City, used the ability of the magic city to satisfy all desires to lure Tang Sanzang's heart demon. In the end, Tang Sanzang overcame his inner demons and awakened again. He and his apprentices joined forces to defeat Moying, disintegrated the evil city that was the evil side, and embarked on the journey of saving the common people in the world again.
翻译理由: “The Westward”简洁地指代了“西行纪”这一故事背景，而“Shadow Citadel”用“Citadel”（堡垒/要塞）取代直译的“Demon City”，强调了“魔城”作为黑暗势力核心的强大与险恶，使译名更具电影感和史诗气质。

Overview: Two warriors in pursuit of a stolen sword and a notorious fugitive are led to an impetuous, physically-skilled, teenage nobleman's daughter, who is at a crossroads in her life.
翻译理由: 该译名使用“Veiled”（蒙蔽的，隐藏的）和“Waiting”（等待爆发的）来取代直译的动词，更侧重于影片中“隐匿的武术高手”和“即将爆发的潜能”这一核心主题。它保留了中国文化中龙虎的象征意义，使译名既具备武侠的史诗感，又自然流畅。

Overview: A hero of government affairs, protect the world!  At the end of Qing Dynasty. Japan, which is trying to seize Tianjin, where even great powers cannot easily enter, and further devour China, opens the Honghua Military Academy in Tianjin and suppresses the Tianjin Martial Arts Association. Huo Yuan Jia, an expert in the field, engages in a life-threatening battle with Kamesaburo Takeda, a Japanese military commander in order to prevent Japan's ambitions.
英文译名: Huo Yuanjia: Realm of the Elite Fist
翻译理由: 此译名保留了主角的身份，并使用“Elite Fist”来传达“精武”所蕴含的顶尖技艺与民族精神。“Realm”有效地转化了宏大的“天下”概念，将这场武术较量升华为一场关乎国家主权与命运的领域之争。

Overview: Yu Hong leaves her home village and starts university in Beijing, where she develops a consuming and compulsive relationship with another student. The student riots from 1989 then ensue and take a toll on their lives.
A sinful martial arts expert wants to start a new tranquil life, only to be hunted by a determined detective and his former master.
翻译理由: 此译名将原片名中的“武俠”這一宏大的類型概念，轉化為聚焦於主角個人內心衝突的敘事標題。它體現了主角渴望獲得平靜（Silence）的生活，卻被其隱藏的暴力與過去（Sword）不斷追逐和清算的雙重主題。

Overview: At the end of the Eastern Han Dynasty, Liu Qi, the son of Zhongliang, guarded a crumbling pass in the middle of the desert and declared his place "refuge". Various forces gathered here to achieve a strange balance. One day, Geng Zhong, a general of the Han army, arrives and breaks the rules of the refuge, and from then on, Liu Qi is pushed by a series of events to make a series of choices about death, family, friendship, love, family and country.
翻译理由: “Watchtower”代替直译的“Pass”，更贴切地表现了原片名中“关”作为边陲孤立、衰败的军事哨所的意象。翻译强调“Han Era”（汉时），明确了故事所处的历史背景，突显了这座关隘在王朝更迭中的历史见证者地位。

Overview: After going through a series of tragic events in his life, martial arts master Huo Yuanjia returns to Tianjin and must fight four international soldiers, in order to safeguard his nation's pride.

In 9th century China, a corrupt government wages war against a rebel army called the Flying Daggers. A romantic warrior breaks a beautiful rebel out of prison to help her rejoin her fellows, but things are not what they seem.
英文译名: (或者：The Unseen Perimeter)
翻译理由: 此译名侧重于原片名“十面”所代表的四面楚歌与“埋伏”的战略陷阱，突出了人物面对的复杂命运和无法逃脱的计谋，符合影片中高密度的欺骗与致命包围的主题。它避免了数字直译，同时传达了原片名中战略压迫感的文化意涵。

Overview: 24 years ago, "God of Sabre" Yang Changfeng was double-crossed and murdered by someone close to him.
英文译名: The Luminous Saber of the Horizon
翻译理由: 此译名将“天涯”转化为体现史诗感的“Horizon”（天际/远方），而将“明月刀”精炼为“Luminous Saber”，突出刀锋在月光下的清冷与使命感。整体结构自然流畅，既保留了原片名中孤寂、宏大的武侠意境，又暗示了复仇的清明与距离。

Overview: In 1868 during the late Qing Dynasty, rampant corruption on the Imperial Court inflicts much suffering in people's lives. For years, the Black Tiger’s fearsome boss Lei Gong has been trying to get rid of the leader of the Northern Sea. One of his latest recruits is Fei, a fearless fighter who takes the Northern Sea leader’s head after a fierce fight. Just as Lei Gong believes he has total control of the port, a new gang called the Orphans rises in power. Led by Fei’s childhood friend Huo, the Orphans are out to eliminate all the criminal power from the port…
英文译名: Wong Fei-hung: A Destiny Forged in Dream
翻译理由: 保留标志性的粤语拼音“Wong Fei-hung”是为了维持核心人物的文化识别度。副标题“A Destiny Forged in Dream”将“英雄有梦”提升为一种宏大的叙事主题，暗示了年轻黄飞鸿在混乱时代中，通过奋斗与野心成就英雄命运的过程。

Overview: In 208 A.D., in the final days of the Han Dynasty, shrewd Prime Minster Cao convinced the fickle Emperor Han the only way to unite all of China was to declare war on the kingdoms of Xu in the west and East Wu in the south. Thus began a military campaign of unprecedented scale. Left with no other hope for survival, the kingdoms of Xu and East Wu formed an unlikely alliance.
英文译名: The Crimson Crucible
翻译理由: “Crimson”保留了“赤”的色彩意象，暗示了战火与鲜血；而“Crucible”（熔炉）象征着极度严酷的考验和决定性的历史转折点，恰当地体现了赤壁之战的战略重要性。

Overview: The battle of Red Cliff continues and the alliance between Xu and East Wu is fracturing.  With Cao Cao's massive forces on their doorstep, will the kingdoms of Xu and East Wu survive?
英文译名: Red Cliff: Reckoning of the Empire
翻译理由: “Reckoning” 准确地捕捉了“決戰”的终局和决定性意味，强调这是决定存亡的最后清算；而 “Empire” 则简洁有力地传达了“天下”所蕴含的统治整个中华大地的宏大文化意涵。

Overview: A Westerner finds refuge with a group of women in a church during Japan's rape of Nanking in 1937. Posing as a priest, he attempts to lead the women to safety.
英文译名: The Thirteen Jewels of Nanking
翻译理由: “Nanking”（南京）直接指代历史背景地“金陵”，增强了译名的历史厚重感。“Jewels”（珠宝）作为“钗”（古代女性装饰品）的意译，既保留了原片名所蕴含的古典美与女性特质，又暗示了这些女性在乱世中的稀有与价值。

Overview: People from Xiangxi have a deep love for their homeland and a tradition of returning to their roots, like fallen leaves. Coupled with the rugged local geography, this gave rise to the profession of "corpse drivers." Long Qiyi and his apprentice Long Ping'an are renowned corpse drivers in the local town. Twenty years ago, Long Qiyi encountered the most dreaded situation for a corpse driver - a dead-end path. Twenty years later, with the appearance of a headless corpse, a series of eerie events began to occur in the town, and surprisingly, these events were connected to what Long Qiyi experienced while driving corpses twenty years ago...
英文译名: The Corpse Walker's Uncanny Trail
翻译理由: “Corpse Walker”是对于湘西“赶尸”文化（Corpse Driver）的更具悬疑色彩的译法，立即点明了故事的文化核心。 “Uncanny Trail”则同时概括了案件的诡异性质（诡案）和尸体搬运者穿越的险峻地理路径。

Overview: Atop the ruins of war, top commander Jiang Ziya is given the task to banish the Nine-tailed Fox Demon who threatens all mortals' very existence. When he discovers the Nine-tailed Fox's life linked to the soul of an innocent girl, he is faced with a challenging decision: follow the will of heaven or find his own path to righteousness.
英文译名: Jiang Ziya: The Path to Righteousness
翻译理由: 该译名保留了“姜子牙”这一关键的文化与神话人物名，以确保核心识别度；同时，副标题着重强调了他面临的选择——拒绝天命，寻求个人良知所指引的真正道义（righteousness）。这突出了原片概述中“find his own path to righteousness”这一核心主题。

English Title: Journey to the West: Conquering the Demons
Overview: In a world plagued by demons who cause great human suffering, young demon hunter Tang Sanzang must fight against monstrous demons, as well as contend with a beautiful demon hunting woman on his path to enlightenment.
英文译名: The Western Odyssey: Subjugation of the Fiends
翻译理由: “Western Odyssey”将“西游”转化为英文语境中广为人知且具史诗感的长篇探险，突显了原著的文化重量。“Subjugation of the Fiends”则以庄重、有力的语调对应“降魔篇”，强调了主角面对强大妖魔的残酷战斗。

Overview: Ip Man’s promising career as a Policeman is ruined after he is framed for murder and targeted by a mob boss’s daughter.
英文译名: The Making of a Patriarch: Ip Man
翻译理由: “Patriarch”比单纯的“Grandmaster”更能体现“宗师”所蕴含的开宗立派、承袭武学道统的文化意涵。“The Making of”则暗示了主角在早年警察生涯中经历磨难与考验，最终成就一代宗师的奋斗历程。

Overview: When the irritable monkey king visits a temple together with his master Tang Monk, he feels offended because of a trifle and thereupon accidentally destroys a magic tree growing on the sacred ground. This brings an ancient demon king back to life, who promptly kidnaps Tang Monk to take revenge for his long imprisonment. The monkey king and his followers have only three days to not only save their master but also to prevent the demon king from regaining his full powers and destroying the world…
英文译名: The Monkey King: Rise of the Primordial Fiend
翻译理由: 此译名将原著IP聚焦于更具全球辨识度的角色名称“The Monkey King”，同时将“再世妖王”转化为“Rise of the Primordial Fiend”。这强调了情节中恶魔是古老且被重新唤醒的强大存在（Primordial/Rise），使其在西方奇幻语境中更具史诗感和动作片张力。

Overview: Sun Wukong is a monkey born from a heavenly stone who acquires supernatural powers. After rebelling against heaven and being imprisoned under a mountain for 500 years, he later accompanies the monk Xuanzang on a journey to India. Thus, according to legend, Buddhism is brought to ancient China.
英文译名: The Legends of the Journey: Uprising in the Celestial Palace
翻译理由: 此译名使用“The Legends of the Journey”来指代《西遊記》这一宏大叙事，避免了常见的直译。同时，“Uprising in the Celestial Palace”精准地传达了“大鬧天宮”所蕴含的孙悟空对神界进行的史诗级、具有叛逆色彩的捣乱与挑战。

Overview: One day a young woman named Blanca is saved by Xuan, a snake catcher from a nearby village. She has lost her memory, and together they go on a journey to discover her real identity, developing deeper feelings for one another along the way. But as they learn more about her past, they uncover a darker plot of supernatural forces vying for power, with the fate of the world hanging in the balance.
英文译名: White Snake: Dawn of Destiny
翻译理由: “White Snake”直接点明了故事主角和传说基础。“Dawn of Destiny”则将“缘起”翻译为“命运的黎明”，既突出了这是这段传奇姻缘的起源（Dawn），又诗意地转化了“缘”所蕴含的宿命与牵引的文化意涵（Destiny）。

Overview: In the late Qing dynasty, foreigners are up to no good and the Qing government is weakening day by day. Under the cover of Eunuch Cao, the Guangzhou government colludes with gangs and foreigners, betrays the country to seek glory, and makes dirty money. When the humanitarian Huang Feihong learns about this, he petitions for the people and makes a scene at the government office. After a desperate struggle, he finally expels the foreign forces and eliminates the gangsters, punishing evil and promoting good, and protecting the family and the country!.
英文译名: Wong Fei-hung: The Black Tribunal
翻译理由: 保留了主角“Wong Fei-hung”（黄飞鸿）的标准译名以确保文化辨识度。“黑衙门”被译为“The Black Tribunal”，用“Black”保持了原词中黑暗与邪恶的语气，并用“Tribunal”取代生僻的“Yamen”，代指被腐败操控的官方权力机构，使其在英文语境中流畅且富有戏剧张力。

Overview: A giant rebelled against the heavens. It was declared a devil and defeated. The immortal heart evolved into Sun Wukong. The heavens found him, and ravaged his home. He enters the heavenly kingdom, disguised as a human, seeking retribution.
英文译名: The Wukong Chronicle
翻译理由: "Chronicle"（纪事/传记）精准地捕捉了原名“传”的史诗性和权威性，暗示这是一个关于神话人物起源和命运的严肃而基础的故事。此译名突出了主角的标志性名称，同时赋予了译名宏大且具有历史感的基调。

Overview: Su Qi-Er, a wealthy man living during the Qing Dynasty who loses his fortune and reputation as a result of a conspiracy against him. After being forced out onto the streets, Su dedicates his life to martial arts and reemerges as a patriotic hero known as the "King of Beggars."
英文译名: Su Qi-Er: The Beggar King
翻译理由: 本译名保留了主角的中文姓名（Su Qi-Er），以保持文化特定性；同时将“乞儿”转化为更具威严和英雄色彩的“Beggar King”，强调了他从贵族到流浪者，最终成为武术宗师的传奇蜕变，使其更符合英语语境中的史诗片名风格。

Overview: The all-powerful Monkey King once roamed freely between Heaven and Earth, but after angering the Gods, he was imprisoned within an ice cage deep within the mountains. 500 years later, monsters attack a small village and a child flees to the mountains. Unknowingly, the child releases the Monkey King from his curse. With the help and encouragement from this special child, Monkey King saves the village from the evil monsters.

English Title: The Pig, the Snake and the Pigeon
Overview: The arrogant, third most-wanted criminal in Taiwan, decides to get rid of the top two competitors and crowns himself the most-wanted criminal before dying.
英文译名: The Trilogy of Vices Purged
翻译理由: 该译名采用“The Trilogy of Vices”来概括原片名中的“三害”，既保留了数字三，又提升了词语的道德和文学感，更贴合电影的警匪片调性。使用“Purged”而非简单的“Eliminated”或“Killed”，是为了强调主角行动的终结性与宿命感，呼应了“除”所蕴含的自我救赎与清算的主题。

Overview: The film is adapted from the story of the second volume of "Strange Tales from a Lonely Studio" and "Ying Ning", which presents a stylish expression of the classic ghost legend. It tells the story of the demon-busting magician Prince Hsu (Huang Youtian) and Tang Wen (Li Xinze) who are entrusted with the task of creating a "Demon Suppressing Divine Weapon". In the process of tracking down the whereabouts of Gan Tie hammer, Prince Fu and Tang Wen discover Ying Ning's secret and start a fantasy love affair.......
英文译名: The Dreamscape of Phantom Tales
翻译理由: 此译名将“大梦”转化为“Dreamscape”，强调故事宏大且虚幻的奇幻世界；“Phantom Tales”则取代“聊斋”，明确指代电影改编自经典的中国鬼怪精怪传说，使译名更具商业吸引力。

English Title: The Yin-Yang Master: Dream of Eternity
Overview: Every few hundred years, the most powerful demon on earth—a snake demon—awakens, and the Yin-Yang Masters are summoned to the capital. Meanwhile, the Princess of the realm has her own plans, as she conspires to claim the demon’s power.
翻译理由: “Conclave”强调了阴阳师们为应对重大危机而进行的正式、秘密的集会（集），契合电影的史诗背景。“Refined Spirits”则保留了原片名中“晴雅”所蕴含的清明、高雅和灵性的文化意涵，赋予译名一种古典的神秘感。

Overview: On the edge of the Gobi desert in Northwest China, Lang returns to his hometown after being released from jail. While working for the local dog patrol team to clear the town of stray dogs before the Olympic Games, he strikes up an unlikely connection with a black dog. These two lonely souls embark on a journey together.

Michael and his right-hand man Scorpion, who find themselves embroiled in their father Ko's turf war against rival gangs in Taipei, setting off a conflict between old and new generations of gangsters. The film is the latest installment in the Gatao franchise, following the narrative of a young successor trying to expand his power while navigating the volatile underworld.
英文译名: The Gatao Syndicate: Call to Arms
翻译理由: 此译名使用“Gatao Syndicate”来准确传达“角頭”所代表的台湾本土帮派组织的文化意涵，而非笼统的黑帮。副标题“Call to Arms”则有力地转化了“鬥陣欸”中那种充满紧迫感、集结开战的街头冲突与世代对决的氛围。

Overview: During China's Warring States period, a district prefect arrives at the palace of Qin Shi Huang, claiming to have killed the three assassins who had made an attempt on the king's life three years ago.
英文译名: The Paragon
翻译理由: 该译名将原片名“英雄”的简单概念提升为一种理想典范或完美的标准，更贴合电影的史诗级格局和对“真正英雄主义”的哲学探讨。它既保留了原片名强调个体角色的力度，也使英文表达更为文学化和引人深思。

Overview: During WWII, in the waters near Zhoushan, China, a Japanese freighter carrying British POWs was sunk, leaving thousands trapped inside by the Japanese military. In this desperate situation, a group of fishermen from Dongji Island step forward without hesitation. Driven by their innate kindness, courage, and unyielding spirit, they brave the stormy seas to open a path of survival for the stranded prisoners.
英文译名: The Eastern Isle Lifeline
翻译理由: 此译名保留了“东极”的地理指向（Eastern Isle），同时用“Lifeline”（生命线）取代了笼统的“岛”字，强调了原片名中蕴含的希望与拯救的主题。它突出了当地渔民在惊涛骇浪中为战俘们打开生存之路的核心英雄行动，使得片名更具故事性和戏剧张力。

Overview: A former spy in the Chinese Nationalist Party falls for an opium-dealing widow, as China is ravaged by war and revolution.
英文译名: The Three-City Tale
翻译理由: “Tale”比“Chronicle”或“Story”更具叙事性和浪漫色彩，更好地对应原片名中的“记”。“Three-City”采用形容词形式，简洁且保留了片名核心的结构与地理跨度，避免了直译的生硬感。

Overview: A group of Wushu students stumble into a child kidnapping ring run by an alumnus.
英文译名: Wushu: The Apprentices' Gauntlet
翻译理由: “Apprentices”取代了直译的“youth”或“students”，强调这群少年正在接受武术的训练与磨砺，更具文化感；“Gauntlet”（严酷的考验）则准确地捕捉了原片名中“行”所蕴含的，关于他们卷入绑架案后所经历的致命考验与成人礼般的行动。

Overview: A town in Fengjie county is gradually being demolished and flooded to make way for the Three Gorges Dam. A man and woman visit the town to locate their estranged spouses, and become witness to the societal changes.
英文译名: The Decent Folk of the Three Gorges
翻译理由: 此译名保留了作为叙事背景核心的“三峡”地理标识，并将“好人”译为“Decent Folk”（正直善良的人们），以此强调在宏大社会变革中，普通民众坚守人性和尊严的主题。该译法避免了直译的生硬感，更自然地传递了电影所关注的边缘群体视角。

Overview: It’s 1941 and the Japanese attack on Pearl Harbor has destroyed America’s morale. The US President Franklin D. Roosevelt then decides to risk it all by bombing Tokyo and raise more hope for his citizens. After completing its mission, a unit of the US Air Force is forced to make an emergency landing in China. Its commander Jack Turner (Emilie Hirsch) barely survives but gets rescued by Ying (Crystal Liu), a local widow who will stop at nothing to hide him from the Japanese occupant.
英文译名: The Smoke and the Silk
翻译理由: 该译名以“Smoke”象征战火硝烟（烽火），以“Silk”指代温婉的中国文化元素与女性的柔美（芳菲）。它在体现战争与柔美并存的主题时，避开了直译，并注入了更具意境的东方文化韵味。

Overview: While living as an ordinary deliveryman and motor racing fan, Nezha encounters old nemeses and must rediscover his powers to protect his loved ones.
翻译理由: “Nezha Reborn”精准地传达了“哪吒重生”的主题，即主角在现代背景下的转世与觉醒。“Chronicle of the New Gods”将“新神榜”解读为一个系列史诗的记录或叙事（Chronicle），避免了直译“List”的生硬感，同时确立了该片在一个重塑神话体系（New Gods）中的史诗地位。

Overview: An orphaned girl, driven by poverty at such a young age, makes a promise with an enchantress. In return for beauty and the admiration of every man, she will never be with the man she loves. This spell cannot be broken unless the impossible happens: snow falling in spring and the dead coming back to life. Now a grown and beautiful princess, she regrets her promise, for all of the men she's loved has always been met with tragedy.
翻译理由: 该译名将“无极”（Boundless/Infinite）的哲学意涵与剧情的核心——女主角的悲剧性誓约（Promise）相结合。它强调了诅咒的绝对性与史诗般的规模，使抽象的中文片名更具英文语境下的戏剧张力与可看性。

Overview: High in the mountains of Taiwan, is the remote village of Smangus. Inhabited by a unique group of indigenous people called the Tayal, Smangus is the only place in Taiwan that now practices common ownership of land and property. This is a place where nature and man have found balance. Now, witness every part of the lives of these people, through pain and joy, and experience the unique bonds formed with the ancient trees around them, in a film that documents A Year In The Clouds - a year amongst the sacred forests of this tribe.
英文译名: The Tayal Sanctuary of Smangus
翻译理由: 该译名保留了作为地理专名的“Smangus”，并搭配“The Tayal Sanctuary”（泰雅族的圣所）以强调其文化属性。这突出了纪录片中特有的原住民社群（Tayal）及其对土地与传统的守护，而非仅是一个地理地点。

English Title: Master Of The Shadowless Kick: Wong Kei-Ying
Overview: A quiet physician from southern China masters martial arts to protect his son and stop a corrupt governor.
翻译理由: 我将“擎天”译为“The Pillar of Heaven”，以凸显黄麒英作为英雄人物，支撑社稷，对抗腐败的宏大身份。此译名结构结合了主角的尊称（Master Huang）和其传奇武学（Shadowless Kick），贴合英文武侠电影的叙事风格。

Overview: Young monster kids try to make peace between the world of humans and the world of the monsters.

Chinese Title: 闪闪的红星 孩子的天空
Overview: An animated remake of the 1974 children's movie "Shan shan de hong xing"
英文译名: The Radiant Red Star: A Child's Horizon
翻译理由: “Radiant Red Star”既保留了原片名核心的象征意义（红星），又用“Radiant”来体现“闪闪的”所蕴含的理想主义与希望；“A Child's Horizon”则将“孩子的天空”转化为更具前瞻性的英文表达，意指革命理想为孩子开辟的广阔未来。

Overview: Liang Xi Mei (Jack Neo) is finally back! Having retired, Liang Xi Mei spends her time looking after her two obedient grandsons. However, Liang Xi Mei still leads a colorful life thanks to her absent-minded BFF Guang Dong Po (Wang Lei), who frequently muddles things up, leaving Liang Xi Mei to resolve the mess; and Lion King (Henry Thia) who is now diagnosed with mild Alzheimer’s, causing confusion and frustrations for everyone. Robert (Mark Lee), Liang Xi Mei’s eldest son also adds to her woes. Robert is a dreamer who often schemes to get rich quick. This causes Liang Xi Mei to find him unreliable and puts all her hopes on her youngest son Albert (Benjamin Josiah Tan). Her favoritism stirs up jealousy within Robert, who vows to strike it rich to win back Liang Xi Mei’s approval.
英文译名: Liang Xi Mei's Wonderful Fortune
翻译理由: 此译名保留了主角名，并巧妙地将中文片名中“旺得福”与英文“Wonderful”的语音双关融入，体现了电影的喜剧色彩。同时，“Fortune”一词准确地传达了原片名中“旺”与“福”所蕴含的吉祥、兴旺的文化意涵。

Overview: Iconic actress Jean Yu returns to Japanese-occupied China to star in a play directed by her former lover. However, her undercover work for the Allies soon places her life in grave danger.
英文译名: The Grand Orchid Stage
翻译理由: “The Grand Orchid Stage”保留了原片名中“兰”（Orchid）所象征的东方古典优雅，将其融入“大剧院”转化为更具戏剧性和氛围感的“舞台”（Stage）。此译名不仅突显了故事的核心场景，也暗示了间谍活动的高风险性质——所有秘密行动皆在聚光灯下进行。

Overview: In 1953 the Korean War is entering the final stage. The People's Volunteer Army of China has launched its last major battle in Kumsong. In order to arrive on time and deliver enough ammo to the Kumsong front line, the soldiers have to defend themselves against the never ending bombardments of enemy bombers and race against time to repair the last bridge, all while facing supply shortages and with inferior equipment.
翻译理由: 该译名将“金刚”（Jīngāng）蕴含的坚不可摧和极度韧性转化为“Unyielding”（不屈不挠），强调了士兵们在猛烈轰炸下持续修复和保卫桥梁的意志。同时，“Stream”对应“川”，使得译名既能体现关键地理位置的重要性，也富有战地史诗的凝重感。

Overview: Zhang Chulan, who has been hiding his identity as an Inhuman, is caught up in the vortex of fighting between different Inhuman sects since he meets Feng Baobao, who has a mysterious background. As the secret that Zhang Chulan is the heir to the mysterious technique "Air Body Source Stream" is made public, the Inhuman world has started a fierce battle around him, with forces such as Nadutong, Quanxie Sect, Tianyi Sect, and so on appearing one by one and the battle is about to break out, but at this time, Zhang Chulan accidentally unveils the secret of the year....

There is Mulan Secret Service Organization and they’re Mulan second-generation female agents - Wei Xiaohua (played by Li Xianglin) and Mu Yi (played by Qiu Zixin) And He Zhaoyang (Zhu Hong) to carry out the task of fighting for the treasure map of burying nuclear waste and rare earths. He Zhaoyang tempted the pirate leader Dawton, who was holding a treasure map with her beauty, but almost fell into the trap set by Dawton and Mrs. J, the highest commander of the European Division of the Red Corpse Group. Fortunately, Wei Xiaohua was rescued in time, and with the help of the only surviving agent of the first generation, the only surviving agent of the first generation, Park Enxi
英文译名: Mulan Directive: The Secret Cartograph
翻译理由: 使用“Mulan Directive”确立了组织代号和高级间谍任务的基调，将片名从简单的探险片提升为高风险的国际谍战片。将“藏宝图”转化为“The Secret Cartograph”，强调该图并非关于金银财宝，而是关于稀土和核废料的机密蓝图，更符合影片高科技间谍的背景。

Overview: A group of performing art troupe members each face their own trials and tribulations in Chengdu; from escaping a family scandal to dealing with unrequited love, each experiences rejection that shapes their lives.

Soon after exorcist Yan Chixia (from "Chinese Ghost Story") retired, the Black Mountain monsters disturbed the surrounding area one more time, and experts from Kunlun sect could not even handle it. The messenger in the village trusted by Yan Chixia informed of the appearance of the dead soul flower and the strange apparitions around the village, and asked Yan Chixia for help. Yan Chixia did not follow the little monster's advice and decided to go out and investigate.
英文译名: The Ascetic of the Ghostly Sanctuary
翻译理由: “Ghostly Sanctuary”将兰若（Aranya）译为带有神秘和灵异色彩的地点，精准对应了《倩女幽魂》系列中兰若寺作为妖魔巢穴的文化意涵。“Ascetic”则突出了“行者”作为一位自律、苦行的修行者身份，而非普通的旅行者，符合燕赤霞的背景设定。

Overview: A father who cannot cure his own stubborn illness, a professor mother who struggles with existential questions, a son who is confused and precocious, a giant tortoise that suddenly leaves, and a sentimental grandfather who passed away. The uncle cannot finish reading THE OLD MAN AND THE SEA. The aunt won't get married. The grandfather is his own daughter's enemy. The uncle does not want to return from the Philippines. And an unborn child. Summer goes, and autumn comes. Things remain, but people change.

English Title: The Iron Coffin of Western Xia
Overview: The King of Western Xia has a precious garment called "Bi Lu", which is said to be able to help mortals to ascend to immortality. The emperor is furious and orders Song Ci to find out the truth, whether it is the Western Xia that has the intention to rebel or whether it is really the treasure clothes that hook the soul.

Xiaobai finally found Xu Xian, the reincarnation of Axuan, after 500 years, the two met on the Broken Bridge. Xiaobai and sister hid in the streets and alleys, started a lively life in human world with him and his brother-in-law Li Gongfu.
英文译名: White Snake: A Fleeting World
翻译理由: 主标题直接沿用《白蛇》这一经典的中国文化符号。副标题“A Fleeting World”译自“浮生”，意指凡间人世的短暂与无常，恰当地体现了神灵视角下对凡尘俗世转瞬即逝的体验。

Overview: Somehow, a mentally disturbed 30-year-old man from Taipei finds himself waking up out of a coma in a hospital in a small coastal town in Thailand.  A woman is at his bedside, calling him Assanee. But that's not his name. His name is Her Sue Yong. And besides, he can't speak Thai. He leaps from his bed and runs, and the nurses give chase.  In Taiwan, he was a bedraggled, long-haired scavenger. He had a disfigured face. But in Thailand, the skin on his face is smooth and his hair is short. He's a clean-cut young man with a beautiful wife. And he has a job as a civil servant in a government office. His inability to speak Thai is no problem at work. Heck, there's even a deaf-mute on the staff. All Assanee has to do is wait for people to hand him forms, and he stamps them. Seems easy enough.
When a fellow scientist asks for Jack's help in locating the mausoleum of China's first emperor, the past collides violently with the present as Jack discovers his amazing visions are based in fact.
翻译理由: “Celestial Age”指代古代的辉煌与神性，体现了原片名“神話”的宏大感；“Echoes”则突显了剧情中过去与现在剧烈碰撞、命运不断回响的主题。

Overview: Little Three was originally a cheerful and full of sense of the girl, since cousin Xiaoying  to save her into the sea after they began to banish themselves, but also redefine the weight of the feelings. Xiao Tai. As a matter of skill, a police academy was arranged to the undercover society, in her kind heart, there has always been the right and wrong contradictions and struggles. Fight, in her lost world, became her only emotional outlet.
翻译理由: 该译名采用“Transient”来精准传达“浮生”的短暂、飘忽不定之感，避免了生硬的直译；“Reverie”指白日梦或遐想，恰当地表现了“若梦”的虚幻感，与主角在创伤后进入的自我放逐的迷失状态相呼应。该组合既保留了原片名的古典哲学意境，又在英文语境中流畅且富有诗意。

Overview: Liu Wenhu, the owner of the Liu's Martial Arts Hall in Mount Tai, sets up competitions every year with big money as bait. For several years in a row, he defeated the martial arts masters who came to challenge. So he dominated the country, ran rampant in the village, oppressed the people, and seized the people's daughters. Shi Xiaoyi, the successor of Taishan Stone Art, saw it in his eyes and was angry in his heart.
英文译名: Taishan's Iron Fist
翻译理由: 此译名将“功夫”转化为“Iron Fist”（铁拳），强调了片中反派利用武术进行霸道统治和压迫的负面色彩，更具戏剧张力。保留“Taishan”直接点明了故事的文化地理背景，使译名既具备动作片的力度，也保留了核心的中国文化符号。

Overview: In the latest version of "Liao Zhai: Lian Suo" released in 2014, the scholar Yang Ziwei met Lian Suo at a cemetery. The two did not do that, but wrote poems and painted every night. His friend Xue Sheng learned that Yang Ziwei had a woman with him every night, so he brought his friends to visit Yang's house, which frightened Lian Suo so much that she dared not show up. Yang asked Lian Suo for forgiveness. Later, Lian Suo cried and complained that an evil ghost wanted to force her to be a concubine. Yang fought the evil ghost with a sword in her dream. At the critical moment, she and a warrior named Wang shot the evil ghost to death. Yang and Lian Suo were together every day. One day, Lian told Yang that because she had been eating cooked food and receiving human breath for a long time after she died, her bones had become alive and she had the conditions for resurrection, but she had to have sex with Yang. However, Yang would definitely get a serious illness.
英文译名: Lian Suo: A Chronicle of Spectral Desire
翻译理由: “A Chronicle”是为了保留原片名“譚”（Tale/Chronicle）的古典文学叙事感，与聊齋志異的背景相符。“Spectral Desire”则直接点明了故事核心：关于幽魂（Spectral）的禁忌之爱和情色（Desire）内容，精准地传达了“艷譚”的意涵。

Overview: The civil war in China has ruined many lives including General Pang's. A wounded General Pang is saved by a beautiful young woman along with two other men. Together they vow to eradicate the rebels.
翻译理由: 此译名捕捉了“投名状”作为一种用鲜血或暴力行为来证明忠诚、不可反悔的盟誓的文化意涵，避免了过于直白的逐字翻译。它强调了誓约的庄重与代价，契合电影中兄弟立誓共赴乱世的史诗基调。

Overview: Set in ancient China, Zeng Jing is a skilled assassin who finds herself in possession of a mystical Buddhist monk's remains. She begins a quest to return the remains to its rightful resting place, and thus places herself in mortal danger because a team of assassins is in a deadly pursuit to possess the remains which holds an ancient power-wielding secret.

This film tells the story of Ma Yongzhen, who was born in a family of martial arts in the early years of the Republic of China. In order to help the people of Shanghai's Zhabei district, Teacher Ma ventured into danger alone, relying on his martial arts and a fiery patriotic heart to fight the Five Lakes Gang and the French martial artists.

Huanyi Village had a strange disease rampant. Under the guidance of Elder Xi, the mountain guardian Changsheng searched for medicinal herbs for the villagers, but this was inefficient and dangerous, so Changsheng decided to find the legendary Nine-color Deer King to save the village; In the middle of the story, the demon queen strayed to control the palace and sought the trace of the nine-colored deer king in order to practice sorcery
英文译名: The Nine-Colored Deer King: Karmic Echoes
翻译理由: “Nine-Colored Deer King”保留了神话原型和“九色鹿”这一中国特有的佛教典故；“Karmic Echoes”（业力回响）则取代了直译的“前尘”，以更流畅且富有禅意的词汇，准确地传达了“前尘”所蕴含的宿命、因果以及对过去世的追溯。

Overview: Liang Kun has been practicing Shaolin kung fu for years. To protect his beloved, he vows not to interfere with matters of the martial arts world. But then, the person he loves the most dies tragically as a result. Finally grasping the true meaning of the martial arts world, Liang Kun decides to fight various groups of bandits in order to avenge his beloved.
英文译名: The Ten Tigers of Canton: Iron Fist Unconquerable
翻译理由: 该译名首先使用了香港武侠片翻译中常用的“Canton”代替“Guangdong”，以准确传达“广东十虎”这一经典的中国武术文化背景。核心词“铁拳无敌”被转化为富有力量感的短语“Iron Fist Unconquerable”，既保留了极致力量的意味，也使译名在英文语境中更加流畅和具有史诗感。
